title: MyInstants API
summary: Unnoficial API for accessing MyInstants sound library with scraping capabilities.
description:
This API provides endpoints to discover trending sounds, user favorites, sound details, and search operations on [MyInstants](https://www.myinstants.com/). It scrapes the website to retrieve sound data.

Originally made by [abdipr/myinstants-api](https://github.com/abdipr/myinstants-api); I rewrote it to Python and updated it.

Donations are the only thing that keeps this project alive. Support is more than appreciated! [https://bento.me/fanaticexplorer](https://bento.me/fanaticexplorer)

openapi_tags.name: Sound Discovery
openapi_tags.description: Endpoints for discovering trending and popular sounds

openapi_tags.name: User Content
openapi_tags.description: Operations related to user profiles and content

openapi_tags.name: Sound Details
openapi_tags.description: Get detailed information about specific sounds
